resources.string: My Application
Canberra is the capital of Australia.
The Pacific is larger than the Atlantic.
Suez Canal connects the Red Sea with the Indian Ocean.
Source of the Nile is in Egypt.
The Amazon is the longest river in the Americas.
Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
Peru accounts for more than half of the western coastline of South America.
The Karun River runs through Baghdad.
McMurdo, Antarctica is the driest place on Earth.
Tatooine, a fictional location from Star Wars, is based on the African country of Gabon.
